Hey Orion
I think we'd jive

Introduction

Through and through, I am a designer. I have gathered a plethera of experience working in everything from interiors and floral design to graphics and immersive marketing campaigns. However, nothing has captivated my interest as much as web development. My disposition is to spend my time immersed in front-end systems, obsessing over the intricacies of responsive design, ensuring a seamless user experience. My current muse is GreenSock animation platform. I am also passionate about taking on back-end challenges, and thoroughly enjoy the satisfaction of properly organized code. I am endlessly excited by the learning opportunities within this industry and look forward to the collective future that is being built within the world of code.
